channel.title: I need help please look rep++ [pi]
channel.description: would i use dialog to make it when you click skilling area stuff comes up saying mining fishing/cocking ect?

item.title: I need help please look rep++ [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

If it is what I said before when you click the skill teleport in the mage book tab you just add this in clickingbuttons.

c.getDH().sendOption5(“Mining”, “Smithing”, “Fishing/Cooking”, “Woodcutting”, “Farming”);

Then you just make it teleport somewhere when 1 is clicked.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help please look rep++ [pi]
